name: Entangled
effect: The operative cannot perform actions that involve moving. At the start of its activation, roll 1D6 + APL. On a 6+, remove this state.

name: Bleeding
effect: At the start of the operative's activation, it suffers 1D3 wounds. Roll 1D6 + APL at the end of its activation. On a 5+, remove this state.

name: Burning
effect: At the start of the operative's activation, it suffers 1 wound. After 3 Activations, remove this state.

name: Supressed
effect: When this operative would activate, instead skip its activation and remove this state.

name: Mistbound
effect: Treats all terrain as mist zone, if in a mistzone increase density. At the start of its activation, roll 1D6 + APL. On a 5+, remove this state.

name: Electrified
effect: At the start of the operative's activation, it suffers 1D3 wounds and cannot retain critical successes. To remove, spend 1AP to 'ground' itself.

name: Corrupted
effect: Operative loses 1APL and suffers 1 wound at the end of each activation. Roll 1D6 + APL at the end of its activation. On a 6+, remove this state.

name: Disoriented
effect: Worsen WS/BS by 1. Roll 1D6 + APL at the end of its activation. On a 6+, remove this state.
